text: The future of healthcare is looking bright! 💫🏥 Coresight Research's Retail 2024 report highlights the top 10 trends shaping US healthcare in 2024, including GenAI, precision medicine, AgeTech, mental health awareness, and "food as medicine." 🌱🍎🧬 It's time to embrace the change and revolutionize the way we prioritize our health! 💪
